SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface AdminAppointmentController

All Superinterfaces:
AppointmentController
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminAppointmentControllerImpl
public interface AdminAppointmentController extends AppointmentController
Interface for managing appointment-related operations for administrators. This interface extends AppointmentController and provides additional methods specific to administrative tasks, such as:
  • Viewing all appointments.
  • Filtering appointments by status.
  • Retrieving today's appointments.
  • Generating appointment statistics.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Appointment objects.

    • getAppointmentsByStatus

      List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByStatus(Appointment.AppointmentStatus status)
      Retrieves appointments filtered by a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - The Appointment.AppointmentStatus to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects matching the specified status.

    • getTodaysAppointments

      List<Appointment> getTodaysAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments scheduled for today.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects for today's date.

    • getAppointmentStatistics

      Map<String,Integer> getAppointmentStatistics()
      Generates statistics about appointments in the system. The statistics may include:
      • Total number of appointments.
      • Counts of appointments by status.
      • Other relevant metrics for administrative reporting.
      Returns:
      A Map where the key is a string representing the statistic (e.g., "Completed", "Cancelled") and the value is the count of appointments.
